item.description: Workshop: 3D WebGL app # Workshop Implement a 3d webgl application. The p5.treegl or any other libraries may be used. Problem statement # Design and implement a 3D Application using WebGL, through some library or framwork based on it. Background # WebGL # WebGL is an API for creating 3D graphics on web browsers without the need for any additional plug-ins, and is itself based on the OpenGL API. It uses the Canvas element from HTML to visualize the resulting graphics, and therefore is integrated with the DOM model.
